dublinCore.dc:title: 113 SRES 17 ATS: To constitute the majority party's membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Thirteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Reid submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: To constitute the majority party's membership on certain committees for the One Hundred Thirteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen.

section.text: That the following shall constitute the majority party's membership on the following committees for the One Hundred Thirteenth Congress, or until their successors are chosen:

header.committee-name: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Ms. Stabenow (Chairman), Mr. Leahy, Mr. Harkin, Mr. Baucus, Mr. Brown, Mr. Casey, Ms. Klobuchar, Mr. Bennet, Mrs. Gillibrand, Mr. Donnelly, and Ms. Heitkamp.

Ms. Mikulski (Chairman), Mr. Leahy, Mr. Harkin, Mrs. Murray, Mrs. Feinstein, Mr. Durbin, Mr. Johnson, Ms. Landrieu, Mr. Reed, Mr. Lautenberg, Mr. Pryor, Mr. Tester, Mr. Udall of New Mexico, Mrs. Shaheen, Mr. Merkley, and Mr. Begich.

Mr. Levin (Chairman), Mr. Reed, Mr. Nelson, Mrs. McCaskill, Mr. Udall of Colorado, Mrs. Hagan, Mr. Manchin, Mrs. Shaheen, Mrs. Gillibrand, Mr. Blumenthal, Mr. Donnelly, Ms. Hirono, Mr. Kaine, and Mr. King.

header.committee-name: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Johnson (Chairman), Mr. Reed, Mr. Schumer, Mr. Menendez, Mr. Brown, Mr. Tester, Mr. Warner, Mr. Merkley, Mrs. Hagan, Mr. Manchin, Ms. Warren, and Ms. Heitkamp.

header.committee-name: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Rockefeller (Chairman), Mr. Kerry, Mrs. Boxer, Mr. Nelson, Ms. Cantwell, Mr. Lautenberg, Mr. Pryor, Mrs. McCaskill, Ms. Klobuchar, Mr. Warner, Mr. Begich, Mr. Blumenthal, and Mr. Schatz.

header.committee-name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Wyden (Chairman), Mr. Johnson, Ms. Landrieu, Ms. Cantwell, Mr. Sanders, Ms. Stabenow, Mr. Udall of Colorado, Mr. Franken, Mr. Manchin, Mr. Coons, Mr. Schatz, and Mr. Heinrich.

header.committee-name: Committee on Environment and Public Works:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mrs. Boxer (Chairman), Mr. Baucus, Mr. Carper, Mr. Lautenberg, Mr. Cardin, Mr. Sanders, Mr. Whitehouse, Mr. Udall of New Mexico, Mr. Merkley, and Mrs. Gillibrand.
Mr. Baucus (Chairman), Mr. Rockefeller, Mr. Kerry, Mr. Wyden, Mr. Schumer, Ms. Stabenow, Ms. Cantwell, Mr. Nelson, Mr. Menendez, Mr. Carper, Mr. Cardin, Mr. Brown, and Mr. Bennet.
Mr. Kerry (Chairman), Mrs. Boxer, Mr. Menendez, Mr. Cardin, Mr. Casey, Mrs. Shaheen, Mr. Coons, Mr. Udall of New Mexico, Mr. Murphy, and Mr. Kaine.

header.committee-name: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Harkin (Chairman), Ms. Mikulski, Mrs. Murray, Mr. Sanders, Mr. Casey, Mrs. Hagan, Mr. Franken, Mr. Bennet, Mr. Whitehouse, Ms. Baldwin, Mr. Murphy, and Ms. Warren.

header.committee-name: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Mr. Carper (Chairman), Mr. Levin, Mr. Pryor, Ms. Landrieu, Mrs. McCaskill, Mr. Tester, Mr. Begich, Ms. Baldwin, and Ms. Heitkamp.
Mrs. Feinstein (Chairman), Mr. Rockefeller, Mr. Wyden, Ms. Mikulski, Mr. Udall of Colorado, Mr. Warner, Mr. Heinrich, Mr. King, and Mr. Levin (ex officio).
Mr. Leahy (Chairman), Mrs. Feinstein, Mr. Schumer, Mr. Durbin, Mr. Whitehouse, Ms. Klobuchar, Mr. Franken, Mr. Coons, Mr. Blumenthal, and Ms. Hirono.
Mrs. Murray (Chairman), Mr. Wyden, Mr. Nelson, Ms. Stabenow, Mr. Sanders, Mr. Whitehouse, Mr. Warner, Mr. Merkley, Mr. Coons, Ms. Baldwin, Mr. Kaine, and Mr. King.
Mr. Schumer (Chairman), Mrs. Feinstein, Mr. Durbin, Mrs. Murray, Mr. Pryor, Mr. Udall of New Mexico, Mr. Warner, Mr. Leahy, Ms. Klobuchar, and Mr. King.

header.committee-name: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship:

committee-appointment-paragraph.text: Ms. Landrieu (Chairman), Mr. Levin, Mr. Harkin, Mr. Kerry, Ms. Cantwell, Mr. Pryor, Mr. Cardin, Mrs. Shaheen, Mrs. Hagan, and Ms. Heitkamp.
Mr. Sanders (Chairman), Mr. Rockefeller, Mrs. Murray, Mr. Brown, Mr. Tester, Mr. Begich, Mr. Blumenthal, and Ms. Hirono.
Mr. Nelson (Chairman), Mr. Wyden, Mr. Casey, Mrs. McCaskill, Mr. Whitehouse, Mrs. Gillibrand, Mr. Manchin, Mr. Blumenthal, Ms. Baldwin, Mr. Donnelly, and Ms. Warren.
Mr. Casey (Vice Chairman), Ms. Klobuchar, Mr. Warner, Mr. Sanders, Mr. Murphy, and Mr. Heinrich.
Mrs. Boxer (Chairman), Mr. Pryor, and Mr. Brown.
Ms. Cantwell (Chairman), Mr. Johnson, Mr. Tester, Mr. Udall of New Mexico, Mr. Franken, Mr. Begich, Mr. Schatz, and Ms. Heitkamp.
